```{r}
library(tidyverse)

df <- readxl::read_excel(here::here("analysis", "clustered_technologies.xlsx"))

df_names <- read_csv(here::here("data", "temp", "extracted_technologies.csv")) %>%
    select(authors, file)

df <- df %>% inner_join(df_names, by = c("file" = "file"))

df <- df %>%
    mutate()

df %>%
    filter(str_detect(author_label, "Glick")) %>%
    view() *
    arrange(authors) %>%
        count(author_label, sort = T)
ggplot() +
    geom_point(aes(x = time_period_start, y = author_label, color = cluster)) +
    geom_point(aes(x = time_period_end, y = author_label, color = cluster)) +
    scale_x_continuous(limits = c(1800, NA))
```
